ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They denied them and so they were destroyed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then they accused them of lies, and joined the company of those who were destroyed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So they rejected them, calling them liars, and they too eventually became of those that were destroyed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They called them liars and consequently were destroyed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So they denied them – therefore became of those who were destroyed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, they denied them both and became of those who were destroyed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So they rejected them and became of those who were destroyed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So they cried them lies, and they were among the destroyed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: So they denied them, and became of those who were destroyed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: So they rejected them both, and became those who were destroyed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then they belied the twain; so they became of those who were destroyed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So they impugned the two of them, whereat they were among those who were destroyed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So they accused them of falsehood, and they became of those who were destroyed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So they denied them both [Musa (Moses) and Harun (Aaron)] and became of those who were destroyed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: So they belied them, and they were among the destroyed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So they called them liars, and thus were among those destroyed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So they denied them and were of those destroyed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:48]   So they denied them [both] and became of those who were destroyed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (So they denied them) they denied their message, (and became of those who were destroyed) they were drowned in the sea.
